sqlMap.select: SELECT community_code as id, community_code||' '||community_name||' ('||building_count||')' as text,nvl(building_count,0) as child_Count FROM fc_community order by community_code

SELECT building_code as id, building_code||' '||building_name||' ('||house_count||')' as text,nvl(house_count,0) as child_Count FROM fc_building a WHERE a.community_code = '$parentId$' order by building_code

SELECT a.house_code as id, a.CELL_CODE||'-'||a.FLOOR||'-'||a.DOOR_CODE||' '||b.OWNER_NAME as text,0 as child_Count FROM fc_house a,fc_owner b WHERE a.house_code=b.house_code(+) and b.is_owner(+)='1' and a.building_code = '$parentId$' order by a.house_code
